author: Bellular News
description:
Enjoying games as a cinephile enjoys film is becoming rare. The new generation doesn't explore gaming—they live in one game forever, and they don't call themselves gamers.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:00 Change is the only constant
01:06 Who Is Gaming For?
03:08 The Stats
06:22 The Industry Is Bigger
09:53 The Future Is Now Old Man
13:07 Just Part Of The Crowd
